title: SIGNS LOCATED ADJACENT TO INVERTER(S)
fullText:
The following signs shall be installed for labelling of isolators adjacent to the inverter(s).

(a) 'INVERTER A.C. ISOLATOR'.

(b) '<ENERGY SOURCE, TYPE> ISOLATOR' where 'ENERGY SOURCE' is the energy source (e.g. PV) and 'TYPE' is either a.c. or d.c. (e.g. 'PV ARRAY, D.C. ISOLATOR'. 'WIND TURBINE, A.C. ISOLATOR', 'BATTERY BANK, D.C. ISOLATOR').
